title: RUN.
text: I‚Äôve been on Vinted for 5+ years now Aand can honestly say this is the WORST resale app. Both traffic and ‚Äúsupport‚Äù are completely non existant. My items got deleted for ‚Äúcommercial resale‚Äù and it is impossible to contact support. I keep receiving threats of being blocked if I don‚Äôt delete what THEY think are commercial items. SMH. It‚Äôs not worth the download. Run fast & far!!

title: I didn‚Äôt even get to use it
text: The prices looked good and whatever but I can‚Äôt even make a account because it‚Äôs impossible to make a user name. EVERYTHING I typed in was either taken or ‚Äúnot valid‚Äù you can only use numbers and letters and apparently it can‚Äôt be more than 4 or 6, I tired for 20 MINUTES and I just ended up deleting it.

title: Christy
text: Very timely service. From questions responded to immediately & rec‚Äôve item even faster then I hoped. 2days!! Will use her again!

title: Jeans and sandals
text: I was very happy how fast she replied and put my order together and was easy about bundles. Package was mailed out fast and got it and was very happy.

title: Happy Customer :)
text: Everything arrived quickly and safely and shoes look great! Vee was also very communicative and easy to work with. Thanks again Vee!

title: Wish you could sort closets
text: I have enjoyed using the app but I really wish there was a way to sort or filter out sizes in each closet.

title: Love everything!
text: Thank you so much! Fast shipping and both items were just as described. I love them!

title: BUYERS BEWARE!!!!
text: There is not protection for buyers on this app. I cannot believe this app makes the buyer pay $0.70 for ‚Äúbuyer protection‚Äù when there isn‚Äôt even any protection. Buyers should not have to pay for return labels if the seller mistags or lied about an item. The Vinted team or seller should have to pay for it. This app is a joke and I don‚Äôt think I will be selling or buying on it anymore.

title: DO NOT USE THIS HORRIBLE APP
text: Worst app ever. Customer service is bull. They don‚Äôt listen to you. They simply don‚Äôt care. I don‚Äôt recommend to anyone. Save yourself the headache and don‚Äôt bother with this app at all. Don‚Äôt tell your friends or family about it. Stay away. Use mercari, poshmark, curtsy‚Ä¶ much more reasonable‚Ä¶ fees and all! I‚Äôd give zero stars here if I could cause they don‚Äôt deserve even one.

title: Great seller
text: My order arrived in perfect conditions. I asked them to ship it asap since it was a gift for Christmas and they were sooo helpful!!

title: Don‚Äôt be fooled by the good ratings
text: Had around 30 listings and they all were suddenly taken down as they believed I was ‚Äúcommercial listing‚Äù. Takes a while to update each post (15 seconds) and I‚Äôm not very fond of their plain generic layout. As a buyer, I find a lot of junk for unreasonable prices. Go to Depop for exceptionally better vintage finds!

title: Terrible app
text: I am going to sell my items back in Poshmark because It is such a waist of time to always send the same message to Vinted and fight to keep my post activated. They always deleate my posts because of copyright violation while those pictures are MINE and I took all those picture myself. Terrible such a waist of time.

title: No support!!
text:
I am having a terrible experience with this app.
Bought shoes to my baby and never received them. The sender affirms that the product was sent. The carrier has a confirmation delivery but I never got the package. And Vinted simply don‚Äôt help! No real support! Why me as a buyer have to pay for the flaw in the post?!
Lost my money! Don‚Äôt use this app!

title: Great shoe and great price
text: As soon as I purchase the shoe was sent my way the next day. Came right on time for when I needed them.

title: Blocked for nothing
text: I never sold or bought anything on here. I was looking at dolls and saw a user had stolen images from another listing and let the original lister know someone was using their pictures, came back a few days later to see my account permanently blocked. Customer support is no help.

title: Keeps taking down my own personal photos

title: This app had potential‚Ä¶
text:
Wake up Vinted, you‚Äôre losing users = $$$ 
I find it a waste of time by blocking our accounts for suspicious activity or commercial selling when we have dedicated our time to list. What‚Äôs the point of a selling app when you‚Äôre just gonna list 1 item every once in a while. Pathetic company!

title: ON-Believable Great Purchase!
text: The shoes were brand new, just as described, delivered quickly & will purchase from this seller again!

title: Change of product scam
text: I got a fake airpod 3 from a seller on Vinted going to 3 wks now and returned it through Inpost the very second day after I discovered and seller asked me to return. When the seller got the return it was a piece of clothing they delivered to him. The issue has not been resolved since then and I have not gotten back my ¬£95. What a fraud!

title: Bad app keeps banning my account
text: I downloaded this app and it was good but I purchased one thing and they said my account was sketchy and they would ban me unless o emailed them.
